summary:
My job is my passion, that is why I love to work in every production and I put the same effort in each one of them. I like to work hard to get the best result in the film, advertisement or photography. When I started to work I had the feeling that I didn't know anything, but to the pass of years I learned a lot of things that make me work more efficient and be sure of my job. 
I always want to learn more about my job and all the sector that involve it, that is why I am always open to all kinds of productions.

education.field_of_study: Cinematografía y producción de cine y vídeo

profile_positions.description:
- Organize all the photoshoots and filmings the company have from the office inside and outside Spain.
- Help in the photoshoots and filmings in Spain and around Europe.
- Make budgets.
- Ask for street license in Barcelona, around Spain and Europe.
- Search for locations.
- Negotiate with the locations owners.
- Organize the travels inside and outside Spain.
- Make transport orders.
- Plan photoshoot and filming scheduling.
- Write contracts.
- Administrative tasks.
- Organize castings.
- Prepare meetings with our Spanish clients and foreign clients.
- Responsible of all the stuff between the models managers.
- Control all the documentation and the licenses need for children in photoshoot and filmings.
- Organize photoshoots.
- Keep actualized the company web.
- Teamwork with my bosses and the different teams in every photoshoot.
- Organize caterings.
- Solve troubles in the photoshoots and filmings.
- Negotiate with our material suppliers and providers.
- Stay tuned on the photoshoot or filiming, always careful about our client needs.
- Organize the calendars for the different projects.
- Rent photo and video material.
- Control the expenses.
- Make sure we receive all the invoices from our providers.
profile_positions.title: Production assistant of two Executive Producers

profile_positions.description:
-	Office work in the series production for the catalan TV3 Night and Day.
-	Control expenses. 
-	Write actors contracts. 
-	Control the actors and team payrolls.
-	Control all the work hours and extra hours. 
-	Pick up materials. 
-	Transport money between the central Mediapro office to the shoot. 
-	Organize a promotion campaign with the catalan TV3 with the series actors. 
-	Administrative tasks. 
-	Work under the order of three bosses. 
-	Keep my bosses informed about some irregularity.
profile_positions.title: Production assistant

profile_positions.description:
-	Help in the production work of the short film Mr. Krakt. 
-	Pick up material. 
-	Drive a van. 
-	Help preparing the catering. 
-	Transport actors and team. 
-	Buy some stuff for the shoot.
profile_positions.title: Production assistant

company.name: ESCAC - Escola Superior de Cinema i Audiovisuals de Catalunya

profile_positions.company: ESCAC - Escola Superior de Cinema i Audiovisuals de Catalunya
profile_positions.description:
- Organize the shoot of the short film The beetle at the end of the street, which we win a lot of prices around the world. 
- Plan the shoot scheduling. 
- Make the budget. 
- Make a crowdfunding campaign to collect more money for the shoot. 
- Search for private donations. 
- Organize the shoot in Valencia from Barcelona. 
- Negotiate with the catering company, the team, the actors, the location owners, the police, the town halls for the street license. 
- Organize the way of living for forty team workers who comes from Barcelona for two weeks of shoot. 
- Make the transport orders. 
- Control the expenses. 
- Have constant meetings with the production company to keep inform about our progress. 
- Solve the troubles in the shoot. 
- Organize a big party in a town to get enough free extras for a particular scene. 
- Lead a production team. 
- Teamwork with the bosses of the other teams. 
- Organize the travels between Barcelona and Valencia. 
- Advise the director. 
- Supervise the postproduction.
profile_positions.title: Producer

profile_positions.company: ESCAC - Escola Superior de Cinema i Audiovisuals de Catalunya
profile_positions.description:
- Organize the shoot of the short film Nómada.
- Organize the film of the short film "Nómada".
- Have constant meetings with the production company to keep informed about our progress.
- Make the budget.
- Control the expenses.
- Made a crowdfunding to collect more money for the film.
- Ask for the film street license and the shoot license to film in the subway in Barcelona.
- Plan the scheduling for the film.
- Negotiate with actors.
- Lead a production team.
- Advise the director in different ways.
- Make transport orders.
- Negotiate with the owners of the locations.
- Solve troubles in the filming.
- Search for the music copyrights.
- Negotiate with our film laboratory in London.
profile_positions.title: Producer

- Follow the propose timings.

- Made the transport orders.
- Negotiate with all the team.

volunteer_experiences.description:
- Clean the facilities.
- Feed the dogs.
- Take care of them.
- I'm attentive to all their needs. 
- When I finish my tasks I can choose one or two dogs for a walk and play with them.
